"Ugly Cute" is the affectionate nickname given to the stone spider that guards the town of Willowshore, a friendly celestial being that inhabits a stone statue as their vessel and stands watch over the small rural town. As the foremost animist of this settlement, you have learned how to use your latent spiritual energy to bring the abilities of the spider with you in your travels.

Apparition Skills Willowshore Lore, Mountain Lore

Vessel Spell: Phantasmal Spiders

Avatar Yanagi-no-Yamagumo Speed 70 feet, climb Speed 70 feet, immune to immobilized;

Melee 1 stone fangs (deadly 3d8, finesse, reach 15 feet, versatile P), Damage @Damage[(6d6+6)[piercing]]

Ranged 1 spirit web (range 120 feet), Damage @Damage[(3d6+3)[spirit]] plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface until it Escapes against your spell DC

Phantasmal Spiders [1 action]

mental, illusion

Range 30 feet Defense Will Duration Sustained up to 1 minute

Calling on the power of Ugly Cute, you manifest hundreds of illusory, tiny stone spiders that swarm the target and stick to them with webs. When you Cast this Spell and each time you Sustain it, choose one creature within range. They must make a Will save. As these are phantasmal spiders, they can affect incorporeal creatures just the same as corporeal creatures. On a failure, they become immobilized from the phantasmal webs for 1 round and sickened 1 (or sickened 2 on a critical failure). A creature immobilized from the spell may attempt to Escape on their turn, using your spell DC as the Escape DC. A target that critically succeeds at their saving throw becomes immune to phantasmal spiders for 1 minute.
